amendatorysection.para: Foreclosure consulting contract means any agreement between a foreclosure consultant and a homeowner.

annotation.para: In order to satisfy subsection (6) of this section, there must be a good faith attempt to agree, consisting of an offer made in good faith and a reasonable effort to induce the owner to accept it. Camden v. Papio Missouri River NRD, 22 Neb. App. 308, 854 N.W.2d 334 (2014).
